results.title: Hypoglycemic drugs, circulating inflammatory proteins, and gallbladder diseases: A mediation mendelian randomization study.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ plays a protective role in @<m>DISEASE_Cholelithiasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002769 @@@cholelithiasis@@@, while GLP-1RA have a harmful effect on the risk of @DISEASE_Cholecystitis @DISEASE_MESH:D002764 @@@cholecystitis@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang ZQ, Zhang JY, Tang X, Zhou JB. Hypoglycemic drugs, circulating inflammatory proteins, and gallbladder diseases: A mediation mendelian randomization study. Diabetes Res Clin Pract. 2024 Oct 2;217():111882. PMID: 39366640
citations.BibTeX: @article{39366640, title={Hypoglycemic drugs, circulating inflammatory proteins, and gallbladder diseases: A mediation mendelian randomization study.}, author={Wang ZQ and Zhang JY and Tang X and Zhou JB}, journal={Diabetes Res Clin Pract}, volume={217}, pages={111882}}

results.title: Metformin treatment prevents gallstone formation but mimics porcelain gallbladder in C57Bl/6 mice.
results.text_hl: While previous studies claimed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ decreases the chance of developing @<m>DISEASE_Cholelithiasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002769 @@@GD@@@ in @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, this phenomenon has not been investigated in animal models to date.

citations.NLM: Dorvash MR, Khoshnood MJ, Saber H, Dehghanian A, Mosaddeghi P, Firouzabadi N. Metformin treatment prevents gallstone formation but mimics porcelain gallbladder in C57Bl/6 mice. Eur J Pharmacol. 2018 Aug 15;833():165-172. PMID: 29883669
citations.BibTeX: @article{29883669, title={Metformin treatment prevents gallstone formation but mimics porcelain gallbladder in C57Bl/6 mice.}, author={Dorvash MR and Khoshnood MJ and Saber H and Dehghanian A and Mosaddeghi P and Firouzabadi N}, journal={Eur J Pharmacol}, volume={833}, pages={165-172}}
